statements: SELECT * FROM certificates;
SELECT domain, issuer FROM certificates;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE domain = 'example.com';
SELECT id, domain, expiration_date FROM certificates ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date < NOW();
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE domain = 'example.com';
SELECT domain, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT domain, issuer, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE issuer = 'Let's Encrypt' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certificates FROM certificates;
SELECT domain, public_key FROM certificates WHERE domain LIKE '%google%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM certificates;
SELECT certificate_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE certificate_id = 3;
SELECT certificate_name FROM certificates WHERE certificate_name LIKE '%Cert%';
SELECT * FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE id = 1;
SELECT certificate_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM certificates JOIN devices ON certificates.id = devices.certificate_id;
SELECT AVG(id) AS average_id, COUNT(*) AS total_certificates FROM certificates;
SELECT * FROM certificates;
SELECT id, owner_name, expiry_date FROM certificates WHERE owner_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE owner_id = 12345;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email FROM certificates JOIN users ON certificates.owner_name = users.username;
SELECT * FROM certificates WHERE owner_name = 'Alice' ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type, owner_id FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Mobile' AND owner_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' ORDER BY username;
SELECT id, expiry_date FROM certificates WHERE expiry_date < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT owner_name, owner_email FROM certificates INNER JOIN users ON owner_id = user_id WHERE owner_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM certificates;
SELECT certificate_name, expiration_date FROM certificates WHERE issuer = 'Company XYZ';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name FROM devices WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, date_time, action FROM logs ORDER BY date_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM certificates;
SELECT certificate_name, issuer FROM certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, date_time, action FROM logs WHERE device_id = 5 ORDER BY date_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM digital_certificates;
SELECT certificate_data, expiration_date, issuer_name FROM digital_certificates WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT subject_name, issuer_name FROM digital_certificates WHERE issuer_name = 'ACME Corp';
SELECT id, certificate_data FROM digital_certificates ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certificates FROM digital_certificates;
SELECT * FROM digital_certificates WHERE issuer_name = 'Example Inc.';
SELECT id, certificate_data, expiration_date FROM digital_certificates WHERE expiration_date > NOW();

SELECT users.user_id, devices.device_name, access_logs.access_time FROM users INNER JOIN devices ON users.user_id = devices.user_id INNER JOIN access_logs ON users.user_id = access_logs.user_id WHERE devices.device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT d.device_name, u.username, al.access_time, al.success_status FROM devices d, users u, access_logs al WHERE d.user_id = u.user_id AND al.device_id = d.device_id;

SELECT dc.id, dc.certificate_data, dc.expiration_date, rl.revocation_date, rl.reason FROM digital_certificates dc LEFT JOIN revocation_lists rl ON dc.id = rl.certificate_id WHERE rl.revocation_date IS NOT NULL;
